ygData.subject: Re: dual weild
ygData.msgSnippet: I had an odd experience with training or not training duel wield. I hit level 17 and decided to head back to Kelethin to pick my new song. I knew that I could
ygData.messageBody:
I had an odd experience with training or not training duel wield.

I hit level 17 and decided to head back to Kelethin to pick my new song. I
knew that I could now use duel wield and that I probably need to point into
it for it to work, but I forgot to train in Freeport before I left, and then
when I arrived at Kelethin I forgot to train there as well.

Now back in Freeport I went to the guild intent on putting some points into
duel wield before I returned to hunting in Oasis. But to my surprise when I
scrolled down to duel wield in the skills window I did not see the friendly
"no charge" text, but a charge of 1 plat 3 gold. Hmmm.

So off I went to oasis, equipped my dwarven axe and combine longsword and
proceeded to pound crocs..

You have become better at duel wield (35)

So I am stumped. I never tried to use two weapons before, didn't train it,
and all of a sudden I am starting out with a skill of 34.

Any ideas?

Bernwyn





----- Original Message -----
From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 1999 10:22 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] dual weild


> From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
> Well you are able to live without putting a asingle point into the skill.
> It will take forever to get the first few points through actually using
> it. I tried to do begging from scratch while waiting for the boat. I
> think I had to hit that button about 200-300 times before I got the
> begging(1) message. What can I say I took the boat a lot in my youth back
> in the days when there was only one boat travelling from Butcherblock and
> Freeport ^_^.
>
> Treilanin Loreweaver
>
>
> On Wed, 17 Nov 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > like many skills (e.g. warrior's double attack) i thought we had to put
1
> > skill point into duel wield to learn the basics. could be wrong though
> > hehe.
> >
> > Shada
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
